channel.title: Error connecting?
channel.description: when somebody tries to play my server the screen can load in to the login screen but when people try to login it doen't work. I already porfowarded.

item.title: Error connecting?
item.dc:creator: @freakinlost freakinlost
item.description:
@freakinlost wrote:

[quote=“The Chubby Bunny, post:5, topic:315756”]port forward
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again
than do it again

and If it doesn’t work, turn off you computer and go finish your homework, it’s almost bed time/[/quote]

portforwarding 9 times will not fix the damn problem and if your going to be a retard a flame then don’t help at all…

anyways try and make a new ip for your server

item.title: Error connecting?
item.dc:creator: @Sonneillon Sonneillon
item.description:
@Sonneillon wrote:

My suggestions:
1:Make sure he/she is typing the right IP
2:Go to the CMD window again, type ipconfig and make sure the IP on your LAN side of the IP Address matches with the one you put on the port-forward page.
3:Re-do all the steps

4: I can teamview you if you want to try and fix this problem, but I doubt you would trust a stranger like me

Read full topic

item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Try port forwarding again.
